name: AlbanyShabbattimes
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: when is shabbat
des: Say "Alexa, when is Shabbat?" Alexa will tell you the candle lighting time (18 minutes before sunset) and havdalah time (3 small stars visible) for the coming Shabbat in Albany, NY.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
